appDesc.message: Easily download Instagram profile photos, preview them, and track follower changes.

profileReadyNotification.message: Profile info is ready! Click the WeXProfile icon to see the details.

notInstagramPageError.message: Please use on an Instagram profile page.

profileFetchError.message: An error occurred while fetching profile information

notProfilePageError.message: A valid Instagram profile page was not found. Please visit a user profile.

openHdPhotoError.message: Could not open HD profile photo

noCachedDataError.message: No profile data found in cache. Please refresh the page and try again.

popupFetchError.message: Could not fetch profile data. Please refresh the page and try again.

clearHistoryConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete the saved follower change history for all profiles?

imageLoadError.message: An error occurred while loading the profile photo.
